original: RV_02.042.02.1{11} mā tvā śyena ud vadhīn mā suparṇo mā tvā vidadiṣumānvīro astā
analyzed: mā tvā śyenaḥ ud vadhīt mā suparṇaḥ mā tvā vidadiṣumān vīraḥ astā

original: RV_02.042.02.2{11} pitryāmanu pradiśaṃ kanikradat sumaṅgalo bhadravādī vadeha
analyzed: pitryām anu pradiśam kanikradat su maṅgalaḥ bhadra vādī vada iha

original: RV_02.042.03.1{11} ava kranda dakṣiṇato gṛhāṇāṃ sumaṅgalo bhadravādī śakunte
analyzed: ava kranda dakṣiṇatas gṛhāṇām su maṅgalaḥ bhadra vādī śakunte

original: RV_02.042.03.2{11} mā na stena īśata māghaśaṃso bṛhad ...
analyzed: mā naḥ stenaḥ īśata mā agha śaṃsaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_02.043.01.1{12} pradakṣinidabhi gṛṇanti kāravo vayo vadanta ṛtuthā śakuntayaḥ
analyzed: pradakṣinit abhi gṛṇanti kāravaḥ vayaḥ vadantaḥ ṛtuthā śakuntayaḥ

original: RV_02.043.01.2{12} ubhe vācau vadati sāmagā iva gāyatraṃ ca traiṣṭubhaṃ cānu rājati
analyzed: ubhe vācau vadati sāma gāḥ iva gāyatram ca traiṣṭubham ca anu rājati

original: RV_02.043.02.1{12} udgāteva śakune sāma gāyasi brahmaputra iva savaneṣu śaṃsasi
analyzed: udgātā iva śakune sāma gāyasi brahma putraḥ iva savaneṣu śaṃsasi

original: RV_02.043.02.2{12} vṛṣeva vājī śiśumatīrapītyā sarvato naḥ śakune bhadramā vada viśvato naḥ śakune puṇyamā vada
analyzed: vṛṣā iva vājī śiśumatīḥ apītya ā sarvatas naḥ śakune bhadra mā vada viśvatas naḥ śakune puṇya mā vada

original: RV_02.043.03.1{12} āvadaṃstvaṃ śakune bhadramā vada tūṣṇīmāsīnaḥ sumatiṃ cikiddhi naḥ
analyzed: āvadan tvam śakune bhadramāḥ vada tūṣṇīm āsīnaḥ sumatim cikiddhi naḥ

original: RV_02.043.03.2{12} yadutpatan vadasi karkariryathā bṛhad . .
analyzed: yat utpatan vadasi karkariḥ yathā bṛhat
